subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The North Carolina freshman forward Ed Davis says he will return to the team for the 2009-10 season. In a statement issued by the university, Davis, a 6-foot-10 native of Richmond, Va., said that he would like to play in the N.B.A., but that he and his family did not think he was ready for that step.
